snippet: The Reimanns own some of the most recognizable consumer brands, including Coty, Bally, Derek Lam, and the Reckitt Benckiser Group, a giant maker of household cleaning supplies.
abstract: The Reimanns own some of the most recognizable consumer brands, including Coty, Bally, Derek Lam, and the Reckitt Benckiser Group, a giant maker of household cleaning supplies.

headline.main: The Billionaire Family Backing the Avon Bid
